In England, in the seven days to 18 March, there were 29,402 new confirmed cases (52.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 11 March, there were 26,856 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 9% (2,546 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 23 March is 20,714,868 (36,631 cases per 100,000 population).
